charges.charge_description: 18:1546: FRAUD AND MISUSE OF VISAS; 18:2 AIDING AND ABETTING (1)

charges.charge_disposition: CT 1: Dft placed on probation for a term of 3 yrs. Ord tht dft shall pay to the US a total fine of $1,000.00, which shall bear interest as provided by law. The total fine shall be pd in monthly payments of not less than $50.00, w/the 1st payment due nlt 30 days after the date of sentencing; dft shall comply w/rules &; reg of the PO &; GO 318; the dftr shall mk the above-ord monthl6y fine paynents of not less than $50.00 during the perod of comm supv. Ord tht dft shall pay to the US a s/a of $50.00 The dft was advised of his right to appeal. (1)
